name: Origami Flight (Demo)
description:
Origami Flight is a sidescrolling 2D shoot' em up where you control a paper airplane with a simple but challenging mission: to save the Origami World. Now you must beat 6 different stages with tons of enemies in order to save the Tsuru from the evil Origami Fox. Under the theme of "origami", the oriental art of folding paper, the game features a wide variety of objects and animals as characters, enemies and obstacles. Airplanes, animals and magical creatures made of paper, scenarios made of chalk and other elements combine with a simple gameplay and a light and fun aesthetic. The game features increasing challenges that create a consistent gaming experience for both casual players and hardcore players. 

It all starts when a 8-years-old boy decides to take a nap after folding a new paper airplane. As he falls asleep, he enters the Origami World. As soon as he enters this new world, an evil threat shows up in the shape of a Fox Origami. The Tsuru, the most traditional origami, are attacked and evil spreads corruption throughout the world. Now addressed as the Hero, he receives from the Wizard Origami the power to restore the world to its former and peaceful self. Free the Tsuru, beat the Fox and save the world! Fly, you fool! 

Key features:

  • Six challenging stages with paper and crayon aesthetics!
  • Six different power-ups!
  • Beat multiple enemies with a single Mega Shot and get a damage shield!
  • Huge variety of enemies!
  • Exciting soundtrack!
  • You can also learn how to fold some of origami!
